file.name: subscriptions.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
servers:
  - url: https://api.mercadopago.com
info:
  title: Mercado Pago API Reference
  version: '1.0'
paths:
  /preapproval:
    post:
      tags:
        - $ref: "#/tags/subscriptions"
      summary: Create a subscription
      description: A subscription is the union between a plan and a customer. The main characteristic of this contract is that it has a configured a payment method and is the basis for creating the invoices. You can also create a subscription without a plan
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                preapproval_plan_id:
                  type: string
                  description: Unique subscription plan identifier. This is an optional field. Our model supports creating subscriptions with or without a plan. If you create a subscription with plan we will take the recurring settings from the plan to create the subscription. When you edit the plan we will update the subscriptions. Decide your best model depending on your business.
                  example: 2c938084726fca480172750000000000
                reason:
                  type: string
                  description: It is a short description that the subscriber will see during the checkout process and in the notifications. It is only required for subscriptions without a plan.
                  example: Yoga classes
                external_reference:
                  type: string
                  description: Reference to sync with your system. This is a free text field to help you with your integration to link the entities. It is only required for subscriptions without a plan.
                  example: YG-1234
                payer_email:
                  required: true
                  type: string
                  description: To create a subscription it is necessary to link it with an email. Then you will get a unique identifier to identify the subscriber.
                  example: test_user@testuser.com
                card_token_id:
                  type: string
                  description: Unique card token identifier 
                  example: e3ed6f098462036dd2cbabe314b9de2a
                auto_recurring:
                  type: object
                  description: Configuration data for recurrence It is only required for subscriptions without a plan.
                  properties:
                    frequency:
                      required: true
                      type: number
                      description: Indicates the frequency value. Along with frequency_type they define the invoice cycle that a subscription will have.
                      example: 1
                    frequency_type:
                      required: true
                      type: string
                      description: Indicates the type of frequency. Along with frequency they define the invoice cycle that a subscription will have.
                      example: months
                      enum:
                        - days -- Indicate a frequency in units of days
                        - months -- Indicate a frequency in units of months
                    start_date:
                      type: string
                      format: date
                      description: Date from which the subscription will be active and we start collecting invoices.
                      example: "2020-06-02T13:07:14.260Z"
                    end_date:
                      type: string
                      format: date
                      description: Date until which the subscription will be active and we will stop charging invoices.
                      example: "2022-07-20T15:59:52.581Z"
                    transaction_amount:
                      type: number
                      description: Amount we will charge on each invoice.
                      example: 10
                    currency_id:
                      required: true
                      type: string
                      description: ID of the currency used in the payment.
                      example: ARS
                      enum:
                        - ARS -- Argentine peso.
                        - BRL -- Brazilian real.
                        - CLP -- Chilean peso.
                        - MXN -- Mexican peso.
                        - COP -- Colombian peso.
                        - PEN -- Peruvian sol.
                        - UYU -- Uruguayan peso.
                back_url:
                  required: true
                  type: string
                  description: Successful return url. Use this setting to redirect your customers  to your site after our checkout. It is only required for subscriptions without a plan.
                  example: https://www.mercadopago.com.ar
                status:
                  type: string
                  description: When you create a subscription, you can make it pending or authorized. Authorized status requires you to indicate a payment method. A pending subscription is waiting for a payment method, that the customer can load into our checkout or by your integration tokenizing a card and adding it to the subscription.
                  example: authorized
                  enum:
                    - pending -- Subscription without a payment method
                    - authorized -- Subscription with a payment method
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  id:
                    type: string
                    example: 2c938084726fca480172750000000000
                    description: Unique subscription identifier.
                  version:
                    type: number
                    example: 0
                    description: How many times the subscription was modified.
                  application_id:
                    type: number
                    example: 1234567812345678
                    description: Unique ID that identifies your application/integration. One of the keys in the pair that make up the credentials that identify an application/integration in your account.
                  collector_id:
                    type: number
                    example: 100200300
                    description: Unique ID that identifies your user as a seller. This ID matches your User ID in our ecosystem.
                  preapproval_plan_id:
                    type: string
                    description: Unique plan identifier.
                    example: 2c938084726fca480172750000000000
                  reason:
                    type: string
                    example: Yoga classes.
                    description: It is a short description that the subscriber will see during the checkout process and in the notifications. It is only required for subscriptions without a plan.
                  external_reference:
                    type: string
                    example: 23546246234
                    description: Reference to sync with your system. This is a free text field to help you with your integration to link the entities.
                  back_url:
                    type: string
                    example: https://www.mercadopago.com.ar
                    description: Successful return URL. Use this setting to redirect your customers to your site after our checkout.
                  init_point:
                    type: string
                    example: https://www.mercadopago.com.ar/subscriptions/checkout?preapproval_id=2c938084726fca480172750000000000
                    description: URL to checkout to add or modify payment method.
                  auto_recurring:
                    type: object
                    description: Configuration data for recurrence.
                    properties:
                      frequency:
                        type: number
                        description: Indicates the frequency value. Together with frequency_type they define the invoice cycle that a subscription will have.
                        example: 1
                      frequency_type:
                        type: string
                        description: Indicates the type of frequency. Together with frequency they define the invoice cycle that a subscription will have.
                        example: months
                        enum:
                          - days -- Indicate a frequency in units of days
                          - months -- Indicate a frequency in units of months
                      start_date:
                        type: string
                        format: date
                        description: Date from which the subscription will be active and we start collecting invoices.
                        example: "2020-06-02T13:07:14.260Z"
                      end_date:
                        type: string
                        format: date
                        description: Date until which the subscription will be active and we will stop charging invoices.
                        example: "2022-07-20T15:59:52.581Z"
                      currency_id:
                        type: string
                        description: ID of the currency used in the payment.
                        example: ARS
                        enum:
                          - ARS -- Argentine peso.
                          - BRL -- Brazilian real.
                          - CLP -- Chilean peso.
                          - MXN -- Mexican peso.
                          - COP -- Colombian peso.
                          - PEN -- Peruvian sol.
                          - UYU -- Uruguayan peso.
                      transaction_amount:
                        type: number
                        description: Amount we will charge on each invoice.
                        example: 10
                      free_trial:
                        type: object
                        description: Free trial data.
                        properties:
                          frequency:
                            type: number
                            description: Indicates the frequency value. Together with frequency_type they define the invoice cycle that a subscription will have.
                            example: 1
                          frequency_type:
                            type: string
                            description: Indicates the type of frequency. Together with frequency they define the invoice cycle that a subscription will have.
                            example: months
                            enum:
                              - days -- Indicate a frequency in units of days
                              - months -- Indicate a frequency in units of months
                  payer_id:
                    type: number
                    example: 123123123
                    description: Unique customer identifier. This is created from the email you used to create the subscription.
                  card_id:
                    type: number
                    example: 123123123
                    description: Unique identifier to retrieve data from the card used as a payment method.
                  payment_method_id:
                    type: number
                    example: 123123123
                    description: Payment method configured.
                  next_payment_date:
                    type: string
                    example: "2022-01-01T11:12:25.892-04:00"
                    description: Date of the next payment debit.
                  date_created:
                    type: string
                    example: "2022-01-01T11:12:25.892-04:00"
                    description: Creation date
                  last_modified:
                    type: string
                    example: "2022-01-01T11:12:25.892-04:00"
                    description: Date of last modification
                  status:
                    type: string
                    example: pending
                    description: Status
                    enum:
                      - pending -- Subscription without a payment method
                      - authorized -- Subscription with a payment method
        '400':
          description: Error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Subscriptions are not available for this country yet
                      - 400--Bad-Request--The payment method account money is not available in your country
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Collector and Application cannot be from different countries
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Field card_token_id is required
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Field payer_email is required
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Invalid value for payer_email, must be a valid email address
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Invalid value for transaction amount, must be a positive number
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Invalid value for transaction amount, only two decimals are allowed
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Invalid value for auto_recurring.currency_id
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Invalid value for auto_recurring.end_date, the date must be after today
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Invalid value for auto_recurring.frequency, must be a positive integer
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Invalid value for auto_recurring.frequency_type, valid ones are days, months
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Invalid value for auto_recurring.start_date, the date must be after today
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Invalid format in auto_recurring.start_date or auto_recurring.end_date
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Invalid value for back_url, must be a valid URL
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Field reason has more than 255 characters
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Field reason has unsupported characters
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Field auto_recurring.frequency is required
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Field auto_recurring.frequency_type is required
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Field auto_recurring.transaction_amount is required
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Field auto_recurring.currency_id is required
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Field auto_recurring.end_date must be after auto_recurring.start_date
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Field external_reference has more than 255 characters
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Field external_reference has unsupported characters
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Already exists a preapproval for user <payer_email> and application <application_id>
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Payer and collector cannot be the same user
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Both payer and collector must be real or test users
                      - 400--Bad-Request--This preapproval cannot be created. The seller does not accept account_money
                      - 400--Bad-Request--This preapproval cannot be created only with payment method account_money
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Cannot operate between different countries
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Cannot create preapproval pending, the feature with account money is disabled for your country.
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Cannot pay an amount lower than min
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Cannot pay an amount greater than max
                      - 400--Bad-Request--You cannot create a preapproval with payment_method in status pending
                      - 400--Bad-Request--You cannot create a new preapproval from a cancelled or inactive template
                      - 400--Bad-Request--The transaction_amount must be the same as preapproval_plan
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Card token was used, please generate new
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Card token was generated without cvv validation
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Invalid request data
        '401':
          description: Error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 401--Unauthorized--CC_VAL_433 Credit card validation has failed
                      - 401--Unauthorized--Verification of collectors personal data is in process, come back later
                      - 401--Unauthorized--Unauthorized access to resource
                      - 401--Unauthorized--This app cannot create subscriptions without a plan
        '403':
          description: Error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 403--Forbidden--The collector does not meet the personal data verification requirements
                      - 403--Forbidden--The caller is not authorized to access this resource
                      - 403--Forbidden--Unauthorized seller for this feature AM_VAL_01
        '500':
          description: Error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 500--Error--Internal server error
  /preapproval_plan:
    post:
      tags:
        - $ref: "#/tags/subscriptions"
      summary: Create a subscription plan
      description: A plan is a template to create subscriptions thats tell how often and how much to charge your customers. Plans can be created with free trials, biiling cycles and more. The subscriptions created from a plan are related to it and allows synchronizing modifications such as reason or amount
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                reason:
                  required: true
                  type: string
                  description: It is a short description that the subscriber will see during the checkout process and in the notifications.
                  example: Yoga classes
                auto_recurring:
                  type: object
                  description: Configuration data for recurrence.
                  properties:
                    frequency:
                      required: true
                      type: number
                      description: Indicates the frequency value. Together with frequency_type they define the invoice cycle that a subscription will have.
                      example: 1
                    frequency_type:
                      required: true
                      type: string
                      description: Indicates the type of frequency. Together with frequency they define the invoice cycle that a subscription will have.
                      example: months
                      enum:
                        - days -- Indicate a frequency in units of days
                        - months -- Indicate a frequency in units of months
                    repetitions:
                      type: number
                      description: It is optional and is used to create a limited subscription. Indicates the number of times that we will repeat the recurrence cycle. If this param is not defined, subscription does not end until some of the parties cancel it.
                      example: 12
                    billing_day:
                      type: number
                      description: Day of the month that the subscription will always be charged. It only accepts values between 1 and 28. This setting is only available for subscriptions with a plan associated.
                      example: 10
                    billing_day_proportional:
                      type: boolean
                      description: Charge a proportional amount to the billing day at the time of registration.
                      example: true
                      enum:
                        - true -- Charge a proportional amount based on the days remaining in the next billing cycle. Billing cycles are always calculated on a 30-day basis.
                        - false -- Charge the amount of the subscription regardless of when in the billing cycle customer subscribe.
                    free_trial:
                      type: object
                      description: Free trial data.
                      properties:
                        frequency:
                          type: number
                          description: Indicates the frequency value. Together with frequency_type they define the invoice cycle that a subscription will have.
                          example: 1
                        frequency_type:
                          type: string
                          description: Indicates the type of frequency. Together with frequency they define the invoice cycle that a subscription will have.
                          example: months
                          enum:
                            - days -- Indicate a frequency in units of days
                            - months -- Indicate a frequency in units of months
                    transaction_amount:
                      type: number
                      description: Amount that will be charged on each invoice.
                      example: 10
                    currency_id:
                      required: true
                      type: string
                      description: ID of the currency used in the payment.
                      example: ARS
                      enum:
                        - ARS -- Argentine peso.
                        - BRL -- Brazilian real.
                        - CLP -- Chilean peso.
                        - MXN -- Mexican peso.
                        - COP -- Colombian peso.
                        - PEN -- Peruvian sol.
                        - UYU -- Uruguayan peso.
                payment_methods_allowed:
                  type: object
                  description: Payment methods enabled at checkout.
                  properties:
                    payment_types:
                      type: array
                      description: Payment types allowed in the payment flow.
                      properties:
                        id:
                          type: string
                          description: Payment type identifier.
                          example: credit_card
                    payment_methods:
                      type: array
                      description: Payment methods allowed in the payment flow.
                      properties:
                        id:
                          type: string
                          description: Payment method identifier.
                          example: bolbradesco
                back_url:
                  required: true
                  type: string
                  description: Successful return URL. Use this setting to redirect your customers to your site after our checkout.
                  example: https://www.yoursite.com
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  id:
                    type: string
                    example: 2c938084726fca480172750000000000
                    description: Unique subscription plan identifier.
                  application_id:
                    type: number
                    example: 1234567812345678
                    description: Unique ID that identifies your application/integration. One of the keys in the pair that make up the credentials that identify an application/integration in your account.
                  collector_id:
                    type: number
                    example: 100200300
                    description: Unique ID that identifies your user as a seller. This ID matches your User ID in our ecosystem.
                  reason:
                    type: string
                    description: It is a short description that the subscriber will see during the checkout process and in the notifications.
                    example: Yoga classes
                  auto_recurring:
                    type: object
                    description: Configuration data for recurrence.
                    properties:
                      frequency:
                        type: number
                        description: Indicates the frequency value. Along with frequency_type they define the invoice cycle that a subscription will have.
                        example: 1
                      frequency_type:
                        type: string
                        description: Indicates the type of frequency. Together with frequency they define the invoice cycle that a subscription will have.
                        example: months
                        enum:
                          - days -- Indicate a frequency in units of days
                          - months -- Indicate a frequency in units of months
                      repetitions:
                        type: number
                        description: It is optional and is used to create a limited subscription. Indicates the number of times that we will repeat the recurrence cycle. If this param is not defined, subscription does not end until some of the parties cancel it.
                        example: 12
                      billing_day:
                        type: number
                        description: Day of the month that the subscription will always be charged. It only accepts values between 1 and 28.
                        example: 10
                      billing_day_proportional:
                        type: boolean
                        description: Charge a proportional amount to the billing day at the time of registration.
                        example: true
                        enum:
                          - true -- Charge a proportional amount based on the days remaining in the next billing cycle. Billing cycles are always calculated on a 30-day basis.
                          - false -- Charge the amount of the subscription regardless of when in the billing cycle customer subscribe.
                      free_trial:
                        type: object
                        description: Free trial data.
                        properties:
                          frequency:
                            type: number
                            description: Indicates the frequency value. Along with frequency_type they define the invoice cycle that a subscription will have.
                            example: 1
                          frequency_type:
                            type: string
                            description: Indicates the type of frequency. Along with frequency they define the invoice cycle that a subscription will have.
                            example: months
                            enum:
                              - days -- Indicate a frequency in units of days
                              - months -- Indicate a frequency in units of months
                      transaction_amount:
                        type: number
                        description: Amount that will be charged on each invoice.
                        example: 10
                      currency_id:
                        type: string
                        description: ID of the currency used in the payment.
                        enum:
                          - ARS -- Argentine peso.
                          - BRL -- Brazilian real.
                          - CLP -- Chilean peso.
                          - MXN -- Mexican peso.
                          - COP -- Colombian peso.
                          - PEN -- Peruvian sol.
                          - UYU -- Uruguayan peso.
                        example: ARS
                  payment_methods_allowed:
                    type: object
                    description: Payment methods enabled at checkout.
                    properties:
                      payment_types:
                        type: array
                        description: Payment types allowed in the payment flow.
                        properties:
                          id:
                            type: string
                            description: Payment type identifier.
                            example: credit_card
                      payment_methods:
                        type: array
                        description: Payment methods allowed in the payment flow.
                        properties:
                          id:
                            type: string
                            description: Payment method identifier.
                            example: bolbradesco
                    back_url:
                      type: string
                      description: Successful return URL. Use this setting to redirect your customers to your site after our checkout.
                      example: https://www.mercadopago.com.ar
                  back_url:
                    type: string
                    description: Successful return URL. Use this setting to redirect your customers to your site after our checkout.
                    example: https://www.mercadopago.com.ar
                  external_reference:
                    type: string
                    example: 23546246234
                    description: Reference to sync with your system. This is a free text field to help you with your integration to link the entities.
                  init_point:
                    type: string
                    example: https://www.mercadopago.com.ar/subscriptions/checkout?preapproval_plan_id=2c938084726fca480172750000000000
                    description: Url to checkout to add payment method
                  date_created:
                    type: string
                    example: 2022-01-01T11:12:25.892-04:00
                    description: Creation date
                  last_modified:
                    type: string
                    example: 2022-01-01T11:12:25.892-04:00
                    description: Date of last modification
                  status:
                    type: string
                    example: active
                    description: Status of the plan.
                    enum:
                      - active -- Plan available to create subscriptions
                      - cancelled -- Plan not available to create subscriptions
        '400':
          description: Error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Parameter back_url is required
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Parameter reason is required
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Parameter external_reference has unsupported characters
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Parameter auto_recurring is required
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Parameters frequency and frequency_type are required in the recurring payments scheme
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Invalid value for back_url. Must be a valid URL
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Invalid value for status. Valid ones ar active, inactive, cancelled.
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Invalid value for transaction_amount, must be a positive number
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Invalid value for transaction_amount, must be a positive integer
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Invalid value for transaction_amount, only two decimals are allowed
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Invalid value for payer_email, must be a valid email address
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Invalid value for currency_id
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Invalid value for frequency, must be a positive integer
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Invalid value for frequency_type
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Invalid value for frequency_type, valid ones are days or months
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Invalid value for repetitions, mus be a positive integer
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Cannot pay an amount greater than max
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Cannot pay an amount lower than min
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Cannot operate with this currency_id in this site
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Cannot operate between diferent countries
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Field currency_id is required
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Reason has unsupported characters
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Plan are not available for this country yet
        '401':
          description: Error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 401--Unauthorized--Must provide your access_token to proceed
        '404':
          description: Error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 404--Not-Found--The application id does not exist
        '500':
          description: Error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 500--Error--Internal server error
  /preapproval/{id}:
    get:
      tags:
        - $ref: "#/tags/subscriptions"
      summary: Get a subscription
      description: Obtains all the information of a subscription from its ID
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: Subscription identifier
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            example: 2c938084726fca480172750000000000
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  id:
                    type: string
                    example: 2c938084726fca480172750000000000
                    description: Unique subscription identifier.
                  version:
                    type: number
                    example: 0
                    description: Indicates how many times the subscription was modified
                  application_id:
                    type: number
                    example: 1234567812345678
                    description: Unique ID that identifies your application/integration. One of the keys in the pair that make up the credentials that identify an application/integration in your account.
                  collector_id:
                    type: number
                    example: 100200300
                    description: Unique ID that identifies your user as a seller. This ID matches your User ID in our ecosystem.
                  preapproval_plan_id:
                    type: string
                    description: Unique subscription plan identifier. This parameter is only available when it is a subscription with a plan and indicates from which plan the subscription was created.
                    example: 2c938084726fca480172750000000000
                  reason:
                    type: string
                    example: Yoga classes.
                    description: It is a short description that the subscriber will see during the checkout process and in the notifications. It is only required for subscriptions without a plan.
                  external_reference:
                    type: string
                    example: 23546246234
                    description: Reference to sync with your system. This is a free text field to help you with your integration to link the entities.
                  back_url:
                    type: string
                    example: https://www.mercadopago.com.ar
                    description: Successful return URL. Use this setting to redirect your customers to your site after our checkout.
                  init_point:
                    type: string
                    example: https://www.mercadopago.com.ar/subscriptions/checkout?preapproval_id=2c938084726fca480172750000000000
                    description: URL to checkout to add or modify payment method.
                  auto_recurring:
                    type: object
                    description: Configuration data for recurrence.
                    properties:
                      frequency:
                        type: number
                        description: Indicates the frequency value. Together with frequency_type they define the invoice cycle that a subscription will have.
                        example: 1
                      frequency_type:
                        type: string
                        description: Indicates the type of frequency. Together with frequency they define the invoice cycle that a subscription will have.
                        example: months
                        enum:
                          - days -- Indicate a frequency in units of days
                          - months -- Indicate a frequency in units of months
                      start_date:
                        type: string
                        format: date
                        description: Date from which the subscription will be active and we start collecting invoices.
                        example: "2020-06-02T13:07:14.260Z"
                      end_date:
                        type: string
                        format: date
                        description: Date until which the subscription will be active and we will stop charging invoices.
                        example: "2022-07-20T15:59:52.581Z"
                      currency_id:
                        type: string
                        description: ID of the currency used in the payment.
                        example: ARS
                        enum:
                          - ARS -- Argentine peso.
                          - BRL -- Brazilian real.
                          - CLP -- Chilean peso.
                          - MXN -- Mexican peso.
                          - COP -- Colombian peso.
                          - PEN -- Peruvian sol.
                          - UYU -- Uruguayan peso.
                      transaction_amount:
                        type: number
                        description: Amount we will charge on each invoice.
                        example: 10
                      free_trial:
                        type: object

                    example: 123123123

                        type: number

    get:
      tags:

      description: Downloads a CSV file with all the subscriptions that match the search request
      parameters:
        - name: collector_id
          in: path

          description: ID of the collector requesting the subscriptions.
          schema:

          in: path

          schema:
            type: string
            example: 2c938084726fca480172750000000000
        - name: status
          in: path
          description: Specifies a status for filtering results from the export. Can be null, one or more than one.
          schema:
            type: string
            example: authorized,cancelled,paused
            enum:
              - pending -- Preapproval without a payment method.
              - authorized -- Preapproval with a valid payment method.
              - paused -- Preapproval with temporally discontinued collection of payments.
              - cancelled -- Preapproval terminated. This is an irreversible state.
        - name: sort
          in: path
          description: Specifies the type of sorting selected to retrieve the subscriptions. You must indicate a field and a sort type with the following format field_name:sort_type.
          schema:
            type: string
            example: payer_id:asc
            enum:
              - asc - Ascending sort
              - desc - Descending sort

                  frequency:

                    example: 1

  /authorized_payments/{id}:
     get:
      tags:
        - $ref: "#/tags/subscriptions"
      summary: Get invoices data
      description: Obtains all the information of a invoice from its ID. Invoices are automatically schedules and charged based on the recurrence defined in the subscription
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: Authorized payment identifier
          required: true
          schema:
            type: number
            example: 3950169598
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  id:
                    type: number
                    description: Unique invoice identifier.
                    example: 6114264375
                  type:
                    type: string
                    description: Type of invoice generated based on recurrence.
                    example: scheduled
                    enum:
                      - scheduled -- Automatically generated and scheduled by the recurrence engine
                  date_created:
                    type: string
                    description: Invoice creation date.
                    example: "2022-01-01T11:12:25.892-04:00"
                  last_modified:
                    type: string
                    description: Invoice last modified date. An invoice is modified when an update occurs in collection attempts or payment.
                    example: "2022-01-01T11:12:25.892-04:00"
                  preapproval_id:
                    type: string
                    description: Subscription ID for which the invoice was created.
                    example: 2c938084726fca480172750000000000
                  reason:
                    type: string
                    description: It is a short description that the subscriber will see during the checkout process and in the notifications.
                    example: Yoga classes
                  external_reference:
                    type: string
                    example: 23546246234
                    description: Reference to sync with your system. This is a free text field to help you with your integration to link the entities.
                  currency_id:
                    type: string
                    description: ID of the currency used in the payment.
                    example: ARS
                    enum:
                      - ARS -- Argentine peso.
                      - BRL -- Brazilian real.
                      - CLP -- Chilean peso.
                      - MXN -- Mexican peso.
                      - COP -- Colombian peso.
                      - PEN -- Peruvian sol.
                      - UYU -- Uruguayan peso.
                  transaction_amount:
                    type: number
                    description: Amount we will charge on each invoice.
                    example: 10
                  debit_date:
                    type: date
                    description: Date on which we will try to make the payment.
                    example: "2022-01-01T11:12:25.892-04:00"
                  retry_attempt:
                    type: number
                    description: How many times we try to collect the invoice.
                    example: 4
                  status:
                    type: string
                    description: Status of the invoice.
                    example: scheduled
                    enum:
                      - scheduled -- Authorized payment scheduled to collect
                      - processed -- Authorized payment collected or exceeded retries
                      - recycling -- Authorized payment in attempt to collect
                      - cancelled -- Authorized payment canceled
                  summarized:
                    type: string
                    description: Summarization status of the invoice result in the subscription.
                    example: pending
                    enum:
                      - pending -- Pending summary in the subscription.
                      - done -- Summarized result in the subscription.
                  payment:
                    type: object
                    description: Payment status related to the invoice.
                    properties:
                      id:
                        type: number
                        description: Unique payment identifier.
                        example: 19951521071
                      status:
                        type: string
                        description: Payment status.
                        example: approved
                        enum:
                          - pending -- The user has not yet completed the payment process
                          - approved -- The payment has been approved and accredited
                          - authorized -- The payment has been authorized but not captured yet
                          - in_process -- Payment is being reviewed
                          - in_mediation -- Users have initiated a dispute
                          - rejected -- Payment was rejected. The user may retry payment
                          - cancelled -- Payment was cancelled by one of the parties or because time for payment has expired
                          - refunded -- Payment was refunded to the user
                          - charged_back -- Was made a chargeback in the buyer’s credit card
                      status_detail:
                        type: string
                        description: Payment status detail.
                        example: accredited
        '400':
          description: Error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 400--Bad-request--Binding exception, parameters passed are invalid
        '401':
          description: Error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 401--Unauthorized--Unauthorized access to resource
        '500':
          description: Error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 500--Error--Internal server error

        '200':
          description: Success
          content:

                    type: number
                    example: 100200300
                    description: Unique ID that identifies your user as a seller. This ID matches your User ID in our ecosystem.

                    example: Yoga classes

                    type: object

                      frequency:
                        type: number
                        description: Indicates the frequency value. Together with frequency_type they define the invoice cycle that a subscription will have.
                        example: 1
                      frequency_type:
                        type: string
                        description: Indicates the type of frequency. Together with frequency they define the invoice cycle that a subscription will have.
                        example: months
                        enum:
                          - days -- Indicate a frequency in units of days
                          - months -- Indicate a frequency in units of months
                      repetitions:
                        type: number
                        description: It is optional and is used to create a limited subscription. Indicates the number of times that we will repeat the recurrence cycle. If this param is not defined, subscription does not end until some of the parties cancel it.
                        example: 12

                        type: number
                        description: Day of the month that the subscription will always be charged. It only accepts values between 1 and 28.
                        example: 10

                        type: boolean

                        example: true

                          - false -- Charge the amount of the subscription regardless of when in the billing cycle customer subscribe.

                        description: Amount we will charge on each invoice.
                        example: 10
                      currency_id:
                        type: string
                        description: ID of the currency used in the payment.
                        example: ARS
                        enum:
                          - ARS -- Argentine peso.
                          - BRL -- Brazilian real.
                          - CLP -- Chilean peso.
                          - MXN -- Mexican peso.
                          - COP -- Colombian peso.
                          - PEN -- Peruvian sol.
                          - UYU -- Uruguayan peso.
                  payment_methods_allowed:
                    type: object
                    description: Payment methods enabled at checkout.
                    properties:
                      payment_types:
                        type: array
                        description: Payment types allowed in the payment flow.
                        properties:
                          id:
                            type: string
                            description: Payment type identifier.
                            example: credit_card

                        type: array

                        properties:

                            type: string
                            description: Payment method identifier.
                            example: bolbradesco
                    back_url:

  /preapproval/search:
    get:
      tags:

      summary: Search subscriptions
      description: Search for subscriptions by using different parameters
      parameters:
        - name: q
          in: path
          description: Free search field.
          schema:
            type: string
            example: Plan gold
        - name: payer_id
          in: path
          description: Unique customer ID to find related subscriptions.
          schema:
            type: number
            example: 123123123
        - name: payer_email
          in: path
          description: Allows you to search for subscriptions registered with this email.
          schema:
            type: string
            example: test_1234@testuser.com
        - name: preapproval_plan_id
          in: path
          description: Specifies a plan ID for filtering results from the search.
          schema:
            type: string
            example: 2c938084726fca480172750000000000
        - name: transaction_amount
          in: path
          description: Specifies a subscription amount for filtering results from the search.
          schema:
            type: number
            example: 1000
        - name: semaphore
          in: path
          description: Specifies the control status of the subscription.
          schema:
            type: string
            example: green
            enum:
              - green -- All collections made.
              - yellow -- With collection problems. We are trying to collect an invoice.
              - red -- With pending collections. An invoice could not be collected.
              - blank -- Discounted collection.
        - name: status
          in: path
          description: Specifies a status for filtering results from the export. Can be null, one or many.
          schema:
            type: string
            example: authorized,cancelled,paused
            enum:
              - pending -- Preapproval without a payment method.
              - authorized -- Preapproval with a valid payment method.
              - paused -- Preapproval with temporally discontinued collection of payments.
              - cancelled -- Preapproval terminated. This is an irreversible state.
        - name: sort
          in: path
          description: Specifies the type of sorting selected to retrieve the subscriptions. You must indicate a field and a sort type with the following format field_name:sort_type.
          schema:
            type: string
            example: payer_id:asc
            enum:
              - asc -- Ascending sort
              - desc -- Descending sort
        - name: offset
          in: path
          description: Specifies the offset of the first item in the collection to return.
          schema:
            type: number
            example: 20
        - name: limit
          in: path
          description: Specifies the maximum number of items to return.
          schema:
            type: number
            example: 20
